entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
